revised_title: Experimental Breeding of Taenia Echinococcus in Dogs from Echinococci of Man
tldr: The author investigates the breeding of Taenia Echinococcus in dogs using echinococci from humans. The study aims to determine the identity of different forms of Echinococcus and their life cycle, with a focus on the tapeworm phase of Echinococcus, known as Taenia echinococcus.
